page.title: 08HOUSING : WILMSLOW
page.content: The houses in the immediate locality of Wilmslow village are mainly {Victorian}and{Georgian}in design but there has been{extensive development} on the outskirts.Between Alderley and Wilmslow there is a new luxurious housing estate known as{Fulshaw Park. Most of the dwellings are two storey detached houses but some are bungalows.They all have private gardens at the rear but the gardens to the front are open plan. On the other side of Wilmslow, along{ {Macclesfield Road,}there are new detached houses on either side.On{ {Prestbury Road}the houses are particularly large.They have extensive gardens with high hedges and long drives.All of them have{burglar alarms and most have{swimming pools.}The houses are built of red brick but the newer ones are of{Cheshire brick.
